definitions: Express the sense of (words or text) in another language.
Be expressed or be capable of being expressed in another language.
Convert something or be converted into (another form or medium)
Convert (a sequence of nucleotides in messenger RNA) to an amino-acid sequence in a protein or polypeptide during synthesis.
Move from one place or condition to another.
Move (a bishop or, in Scotland, a minister) to another see or pastoral charge.
Remove (a saint's relics) to another place.
Convey (someone who is not dead) to heaven.
Cause (a body) to move so that all its parts travel in the same direction, without rotation or change of shape.
Transform (a geometrical figure) in an analogous way.
